mail.body: APS has saved me lots of time and effort over the last year. It is an easy, convenient and comfortable way to deal with P2P in Java.
it's an easy to use, open source library for working with P2P, Files and TCP on the Java platform using the Java Port Framework
APS is a very, very good Java TCP API, high performance, powerful
APS is briefly described as a more complex fork of PAS. Because of this characterization, we dismissed APS without examining it closely.
APS is not very well documented.
